The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the surroundings. The sky is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly in the top left corner, casting a warm glow over the scene.

On the right side of the image, there's a tall building with a green roof, standing out against the blue sky. To the left, there's a white building with a gray roof, adding to the architectural diversity of the scene.

In the center of the image, there's a large archway made of metal and concrete. It spans the width of the street, serving as a focal point in the scene. The archway is surrounded by lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape.

Overall, the image presents a harmonious blend of urban architecture and natural elements, showcasing the beauty of Beijing's streets.
